channel.title: Open Bounties on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Open Bounties on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Ascend Bounty
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Possible app name Progress Ascend It sounds like a fun and engaging way to encourage group participation and goal achievement using blockchain technology.

item.title: Data processing and visual infographics (through DuckDB-WASM)
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)

item.title: Realtime memory knowledge updates (RAG updates)
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Implement a memory storage system Allow realtime context updates for the LLM Refresh the context and LLM knowledge in realtime Add to cycle fine-tuning

item.title: Self-host AI model on the browser
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)

item.title: $icy utility commands
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: ?icy accounting –> smod command or above + head channel only current fund in contract icy in market offset usd unpaid salary advance

item.title: Rework Fortress Command
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: remove: ?event ?staff ?updates rework UI & function (mostly move to note.d) ?digest ?memos ?earn

item.title: Applying MPC for authentication for web3 Console
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Use Multi-Party Computation for secure authentication in a Web3 console environment: Research and implement MPC protocols suitable for authentication. Integrate MPC into the Console app for secure user authentication

item.title: Demo: Biometrics on the web (through external device connection)
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Implement biometric authentication for web applications via external devices: Research and select appropriate biometric hardware compatible with web applications. Develop a secure method for connecting and communicating with the external device.

item.title: Demo: Magic Links
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Implement a ‘Magic Link’ system for passwordless authentication: Develop an email-based authentication system where users receive a unique, time-sensitive link to log in.

item.title: Demo: QR Code based Login
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Create a QR code-based login system for easy and secure access to web applications: Design the QR code generation and scanning process.

item.title: Implement a rust game through WASM
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Design a simple game concept suitable for implementation in Rust. Develop the game logic and user interface in Rust. Compile and optimize the Rust code for WASM.

item.title: Implementing a game server on Rust
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Develop a robust and efficient game server using Rust. Design the server architecture with a focus on scalability and performance. Implement core server functionalities like player management, real-time communication, and game logic.

item.title: Fortress Mma Score
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Update fortress database Create a new table employee_mma_scores including (but not limited): employee_id mastery_score autonomy_score meaning_score rated_at Create a Discord command ?

item.title: Fortress Shanky Data
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: generate & render something as above with following syntax data: source | amount | target sample: Wages [1500] Budget Other [250] Budget Budget [450] Taxes Budget [420] Housing Budget [400] Food Budget [295] Transportation Budget [25] Savings note: hnh i will provide a db view for data queries

item.title: Trend Command
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Requirements ?trend command The idea is to create a ?trend Discord command that will list the top 15 trending repositories on GitHub.
